title: driftersince89
author: driftersince89
content: Fair Launch | Team locked | Liquidity locked | No bots on Telegram | Long term visionMetaReset is a decentralized, community driven, NFT-based social ecosystem for the Metaverse. MetaReset is gradually constructing the core components of this ecosystem.We want to do it right. A MetaWorld cannot only appeal to gamers, or people with VR headsets. User experience & adoption will be our core priority. Blockchain + MetaWorld + RealTime 3D.These fundamental blocks are,MetaPeople - Adam & Eve NFT collection, which will be the original avatars of MetaReset.MetaFamily - Social platform the MetaPeople avatars to engage in a virtual limitless social life. They can make offsprings which are more NFT characters to access MetaReset.MetaAssets - Collection of Lands, houses, stations, restaurants, factories, cars, stores, or any properties as you like it.MetaWorld â€” A virtual world that can only be accessed by MetaPeople avatars where they can trade, showcase their alternate life with endless opportunities.MetaStore - An opportunity for brands and creators to port their digital merchandise for the people in MetaWorld.$Reset Ecosystem TokenMetaReset and its future ecosystem applications will have $Reset as its Currency and reflective index. $RESET's importance is enormous like USD, EUR, AED, INR,and $$ you hold in your bank account. $Reset is a native token for MetaPeople to utilize or earn daily wages, trade resources, chill at restaurants/ lounges, date, provide services or any other formats the MetaPeople decide. $Reset will be the governance, utility and economic layer token of MetaReset. All Community rewards, tax distribution, NFT staking, MetaFamily rewards, will be rewarded only through $RESET.Taxation10% tax on all transactions | 5% Product Development Fund | 5% Top 100 Community Members FundDistributionTotal Supply 1 Billion | 1,000,000,000 RESETCirculating Supply 65.72% | 657,246,000 RESETAdvisors 5% | 50,000,000 RESETPartners 10% | 100,000,000 RESETTeam (6 months lock) 12% | 120,000,000 RESETReserve for Future 7.27% | 72,754,000 RESETCommunity DrivenMetaReset will be a 100% community driven project. Most active community members are identified and rewarded with tax slots in the Top 100 community Member Pool. Each tax slot receives 0.05% of every transaction distributed weekly.Quote"In MetaReset, the happiness index is used to assess the overall quality of life. If you live a happy life and do good/be good to others, you will be rewarded!"Linktree: https://linktr.ee/metaresetWebsite: https://metareset.org/Twitter: https://twitter.com/metaresetMedium: https://medium.com/metaresetTelegram: https://t.me/RESETverseReddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/metareset/Github: https://github.com/MetaResetFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/groups/793446541619339/
